miracles.name: Divine Intervention
miracles.description: Gain a burst of divine energy
miracles.flavorText: Your power manifests in a brilliant flash.

miracles.name: Mass Reveal
miracles.description: Reveal a large portion of the map
miracles.flavorText: The fog parts before your divine sight.

miracles.name: Sanctified Ground
miracles.description: Instantly sanctify 3 tiles
miracles.flavorText: Your domain spreads like wildfire.

miracles.name: Zealous Followers
miracles.description: Your followers' faith burns bright
miracles.flavorText: They sing your praises with fervor.

miracles.name: Fortify Realm
miracles.description: All your tiles gain stability
miracles.flavorText: Your domain becomes unshakeable.

miracles.name: Rapid Expansion
miracles.description: Capture 3 adjacent tiles for free
miracles.flavorText: Your influence spreads unstoppably.

miracles.name: Purging Light
miracles.description: Remove all corruption from the map
miracles.flavorText: Darkness cannot stand before true divinity.

miracles.name: Avatar Summoning
miracles.description: Summon an Elemental Avatar for free
miracles.flavorText: Your domain's champion walks the earth.

miracles.name: Earthquake
miracles.description: Destabilize enemy territories
miracles.flavorText: The ground trembles at your command.

miracles.name: Divine Shield
miracles.description: Your tiles cannot be captured for 2 turns
miracles.flavorText: An impenetrable barrier protects your realm.

miracles.name: Shadow Banishment
miracles.description: Push back Shadow influence dramatically
miracles.flavorText: The darkness recoils from your power.

miracles.name: Domain Resonance
miracles.description: Use your Major Rite for free this turn
miracles.flavorText: Your domain pulses with limitless energy.

miracles.name: Ascension
miracles.description: Take 2 extra turns immediately
miracles.flavorText: Time bends to your divine will.

miracles.name: Genesis
miracles.description: Transform any 5x5 area into your preferred terrain
miracles.flavorText: Remake the world in your image.

miracles.name: Divine Conquest
miracles.description: Capture all tiles adjacent to your territory
miracles.flavorText: Your domain expands in an unstoppable wave.

miracles.name: Apocalypse
miracles.description: Destroy all enemy shrines and fortifications
miracles.flavorText: Let the old world burn.

miracles.name: Unity of Purpose
miracles.description: All units gain +2 Move for 3 turns
miracles.flavorText: Your forces move as one.

miracles.name: Shadow Pact
miracles.description: Convert all corrupted tiles to your ownership
miracles.flavorText: The Shadow recognizes its true master.

miracles.name: Pilgrimage
miracles.description: Gain Faith equal to your Sanctified tiles
miracles.flavorText: The faithful journey to your holy sites.

miracles.name: Holy Crusade
miracles.description: Capture costs -3 for this turn
miracles.flavorText: Your faithful march with righteous fury.

miracles.name: Vision Quest
miracles.description: Discover a random relic
miracles.flavorText: The divine guides you to hidden treasures.

miracles.name: Sanctuary
miracles.description: Create a Sacred Well on an owned tile
miracles.flavorText: A new wellspring of divinity emerges.

miracles.name: Plague of Shadow
miracles.description: Spread corruption to 5 enemy tiles
miracles.flavorText: Darkness spreads at your command.

miracles.name: Rebirth
miracles.description: Restore all destroyed shrines
miracles.flavorText: What was lost shall be found again.

miracles.name: Cosmic Awareness
miracles.description: Reveal the entire map permanently
miracles.flavorText: Nothing is hidden from your sight.
